description: it works. but no noise cancellation. background noises are intense. usable only with headphones, if used with speakers, the other party hears herself. not much eye, candy, it looks crude. but that's the least problem, the aformentioned audio problems are most pressing
been using for a number of years, seems to be least difficult open-source softphone to work with for me
I created 2 accounts and could not delete the accounts. for some reason it allows more than one session to be opened.
summary: Did not work with TLS SIP

description:
If you don't have an sip account you can create it a new one easily to start doing or receiving calls asap.

Also you can pay if you want to call to phone numbers around the world.

Kudos for the creator.
summary: Awesome SIP tool to start callings inmediatly
